full_sentence: Mexico at the moment is in contention with Africa, Saudi Arabia, and the Balkans for the title of the Biggest Shithole on Earth.
Racists are so fragile and whiny. Everything is a threat to THEIR race. Nobody is 100% any race you dipshits. Your dumbass is already mixed so STFU.

I don't agree with nazis, but randomly dragging up his political history when he was posting in a music sub is assaholic and unneeded. Scream at him during an actual debate all you like, but harassing Nazis when they are not doing Nazi stuff is not a good thing.

full_sentence: It's ironic because 'tolerance' is self-terminating as it tolerates intolerant Islam. But then, it has accomplished its purpose: eliminating all whites. Tolerance is just a mean to an end in being anti-white. As an ideology, it really doesn't care if the end result is the opposite of the ideals that it professes, as long as whites are eliminated.
